doc.name: ConstraintsCalculator
doc.description:
The class for calculation of constraints of Swarm-Robots.

Calculates various constraints required by Robots (Ex: Maximum Speed, Distance between each other).
doc.author: Shuhei Emoto
doc.port: The minimum distance to the robot team.
The target location. Particles input that accepts an array of record tokens. One field of the record must be labeled as "weight". Other fields will be resolved to state variables.
